783820.name: Evil Fire
783820.description:
125 years have passed since the mechanical army took over. The Production Base, which was one of the key locations in rebuilding human civilization, started running by some unknown life form. The Allied Forces dispatch Codename K-001 on a scouting mission. Codename K-001 encounters the horrendous existence inside the production base.

EVIL FIRE is a VR exclusive game. You can experience thrilling encounters while fighting unknown life forms that lurk around the base. Complete the mission given to you by the Allied Forces while defeating unknown life forms.

Single mode

The game consists of 3 stages, with different missions for each one. Complete the missions given by the Allied Forces..

Cooperative mode

If you find it too difficult to fight alone, try playing on co-op mode.
In co-op mode, you can play with your friends or other players to help complete missions together.

For Arcades

Evil Fire was designed for VR arcades from the beginning and was commercialized for arcades from 2017.

It supports a variety of extra features for arcades:
- Cooperative mode on LAN
- PPGun controller support
- bHaptics TactSuit support
- Custom animated LED add-on for VIVE
- Configurable features, such as the number of lives of a player

Please contact support@realitymagiq.com to license the full version of Evil Fire for your customers at VR arcades.

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
